nodes.text: Nima Maas was a Human female who was the daughter of Governor Ilov Maas and an Imperial agent who pretended to work for the Rebel sympathizer Temo Dionisio. She had to kill the Rebel politician, but Nok Derrick kidnapped the man before she could do her job. Then, she hired the bounty hunter Greedo in order to find Dionisio. When Greedo found Dionisio, Nima tried to kill both of them, but the Rodian managed to kill her by firing a hidden knife into her throat.
